title: On Itchy Feet
content:
Is it impolite to take off a shoe and sock in public and scratch? What is the accepted way of dealing with this problem? If it is acceptable to just take off your shoe, then why don’t you see people everywhere taking off their shoes in the middle of shopping centres?
Why has no one written a formal guide on what to do in annoying situations? Why is every single sentence in this a question? Aren’t there any answers?
